texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I've used this extremely basic procmail configuration a million times, and it's a great start for any server configuration. It passes e-mails through spamassassin (if they're smaller than 256KB) and then filters any e-mail marked as spam to /dev/null:
texts.text: I've used this extremely basic procmail configuration a million times, and it's a great start for any server configuration. It passes e-mails through spamassassin (if they're smaller than 256KB) and then filters any e-mail marked as spam to /dev/null:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Of course, you can make this much more complicated with some additional customization.
texts.text: Of course, you can make this much more complicated with some additional customization.
